name: Bitwarden Secrets Manager CLI (bws)
description: Installs the bitwarden secrets manager CLI (bws) and optionally configures it to use a self-hosted server.

server_base.description: Provides the base URL of your Bitwarden server, if you host your own server.

server_api.description: Provides an API URL that differs from the default (if in doubt, leave it empty!).

server_identity.description: Provides an identity URL that differs from the default (if in doubt, leave it empty!).
